General.Name: MediaAlpha Inc.
General.Description: MediaAlpha, Inc., through its subsidiaries, operates an insurance customer acquisition platform in the United States. It optimizes customer acquisition in various verticals of property and casualty insurance, health insurance, and life insurance. The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Los Angeles, California.
General.Address: 700 South Flower Street, Los Angeles, CA, United States, 90017
